name: Sacrifice LLC (Jam Version)
description:
Sacrifices for the dark gods are  hard to take care of. As such, most cults seek to outsource the task of performing sacrifices for their dark gods. That is where you come in! Fulfill their requests of sacrifices to eldritch deities, feeding them innocent people, unaware beasts, and a baguette.

----------------------------------------

First game of the Ludum Historica Project, based on the 43rd Ludum Dare Jam theme "Sacrifices Must Be Made"
